description: As dawn breaks over the forest, the troops decamp and return tobase, none of them really believing what happened to them during thenight. Sergeant Ricky Sinz meets them upon return and pulls Kamrunout of the formation for a personal debriefing. It's a daylight scene,this one, and takes place in the middle of the army base. We left themusic off this one so you could hear the clear, unmistakable soundsof sex and the filthy diatribe delivered by Sinz. If you have any desireto hear a dirty mouth going full blast, you must own this scene! It willbecome your all-time favorite for dirty talk.
title: Grunts Brothers In Arms
